oai_dc:dc.dc:title: WIND VARIABILITY AND EXTREME STATISTICS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Cavaleri, Luigi
Bertotti, Luciana
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: extreme statistics
wind variability
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Continuous records of wind speed and direction show a high variability both in the high and low frequency ranges. This variability is usually not considered in the numerical hindcast of a storm. We discuss the related implications for the maximum wave heights and for the values from the statistics of extremes.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 24 (1994): Proceedings of 24th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Kobe, Japan, 1994.
